New Records: Kyrie Irving scored 17 points, recorded 3 assists, and 2 steals in 28 minutes.
Dereck Lively II recorded a double-double with 11 points, 11 rebounds, and 1 assist in 20 minutes.
Key Match Events: Dallas Mavericks defeated the Orlando Magic 108-85 in the game.
Kyrie Irving and Dereck Lively II played significant roles in the victory.
